snippet: Russell has improved his work habits and gained the trust of his Lakers teammates and coaches, but some have criticized his ability to act professionally.
abstract: Los Angeles Lakers player D'Angelo Russell has made drastic improvement in his performance since Coach Byron Scott put him back on starter list in February, which has led Russell's many critics to reconsider their initial judgments about his youth and attitude.
lead_paragraph: Russell has improved his work habits and gained the trust of his Lakers teammates and coaches, but some have criticized his ability to act professionally.

headline.main: After a Rocky Start, D’Angelo Russell Dares His Critics to Reconsider
headline.print_headline: After a Rocky Start, a Prankster Dares His Critics to Reconsider
